entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
